The caller reported being propositioned by Ghislaine Maxwell on a beach in Saint Barth√©lemy between 2000 and 2005, with Maxwell inviting the caller to a private island and suggesting secrecy from her husband.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The document is an FBI intake report regarding a case of child sex trafficking involving Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The caller reported being propositioned by Ghislaine Maxwell on Saint Barth Beach between 2000 and 2005, where Maxwell invited the caller to a private island and discussed her pilot activities.

connections.description: The document is an FBI intake for the Jeffrey Epstein case, and the reported proposition by Maxwell is provided as information regarding that case.

events.title: Proposition by Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Between 2000 and 2005, an individual was propositioned by Ghislaine Maxwell on Saint Barth Beach in the Caribbean. Maxwell invited the individual to a private island, discussed her flying planes and obtaining a helicopter license for secrecy, and suggested the individual's husband did not need to know.

events.title: FBI Crisis Intake Call
events.description: On July 8, 2019, an individual called the FBI National Threat Operations Center to report information regarding the Jeffrey Epstein child sex trafficking case, detailing the past proposition by Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: A new allegation was reported to the FBI on July 8, 2019, regarding Ghislaine Maxwell's activities.
The allegation involves Maxwell propositioning an individual on Saint Barth Beach between 2000 and 2005.
Maxwell invited the individual to a private island, emphasizing secrecy by mentioning her pilot activities and obtaining a helicopter license.
Maxwell suggested the individual could keep the encounter secret from her husband.
The report was logged as part of the FBI's investigation into Jeffrey Epstein for child sex trafficking (Case ID: 31E-NY-3027571).
